overview: Dubbed the Warhol of the digital age, contemporary artist and filmmaker Tyler Shields is infamous for his unsettling aesthetic and star-studded subjects. Tyler’s photographs and films have been exhibited in galleries around the world featuring a host of Hollywood stars, including: Evan Peters, Lindsay Lohan, Aaron Paul, Demi Lovato, Emma Roberts, Dave Franco, Justin Long, Hayden Panetierre, Zachary Quinto and Chris Hardwick, among others.​
title: Tyler Shields: Provocateur
